EmailTemplate.subject: Top 5 cyber threats - How they affect your security operations?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Nokia security management on-demand webinar Are your security operations ready for new cyber threat scenarios? With new cyber threats arising, security experts need a proactive security strategy to secure and protect networks before breaches can occur.
- Extend your network visibility - Detect more, respond faster - Speed up incident response and forensics Find out more from this webinar as our security experts discuss how the top cyber threats should affect your security operations. Connect with us Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
